Articles.Content:
Okay, so I just landed my first manned mission on minmus, but now I got a problem. I EVA'd my entire crew to take a picture, but now to get all of them back I need to go back to the space center, then chose the person from the list of active vessels and walk back to my rocket. And then I need to repeat it again for every man on EVA, which is really annoying.

Is there a simpler way to change the focus in the game? So I can control all of them easily?

Edited March 16, 2014 by Macko939
Use the [ and ] keys, switches craft/kerbal focus within 2.5 km (2500mtrs)
thanks dude thats exactly what I needed
For longer separations, you can click craft and choose Switch To in the map view, so no need to go back to the Space Centre.
You can also use the Targetron mod
